channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Entra role
item.description:
Id: 843318fb-79a6-4168-9e6f-aa9a07481cc4
Display name: Global Secure Access Log Reader
Description: Provides designated security personnel with read-only access to network traffic logs in Microsoft Entra Internet Access and Microsoft Entra Private Access for secure and detailed analysis.
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/843318fb-79a6-4168-9e6f-aa9a07481cc4

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Entra role
item.description:
Id: 024906de-61e5-49c8-8572-40335f1e0e10
Display name: People Administrator
Description: Manage profile photos of users and people settings for all users in the organization.
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/024906de-61e5-49c8-8572-40335f1e0e10

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Entra role
item.description:
Id: 2ea5ce4c-b2d8-4668-bd81-3680bd2d227a
Display name: IoT Device Administrator
Description: Provision new IoT devices, manage their lifecycle, configure certificates, and manage device templates.
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/2ea5ce4c-b2d8-4668-bd81-3680bd2d227a
